title: qntm's author box
content:
[!--
  Use the suggested hack from
  http://community.wikidot.com/howto:include-with-defaults
  to specify a default $other_authors value
--]

[[include more-by:qntm-inner other_authors={$other_authors} | other_authors=[!-- literal empty string doesn't work, so use a comment --]]]
author: qntm
